document_data.name: Avro Quarrel
document_data.mainbody: ro had light skin and shoulder-length orange hair.
document_data.Description: Avro had light skin and shoulder-length orange hair.
document_data.History: During the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]] in the mid-1480s [[DR]],{{DDO-time}}, Avro trained under the supervision of a [[Purple Dragons|Purple Dragon]] with his [[hoe]], learning how to wield a weapon.
